thread.title: VIDEO: Citizen Journalists Capture Despair of Cartel Shooting War near Texas Border
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Citizen Journalists Capture Despair of Cartel Shooting War near Texas Border

author: Cartel Chronicles
title: VIDEO: Citizen Journalists Capture Despair of Cartel Shooting War near Texas Border
text: Citizen journalists in the rural communities of Chihuahua recorded scenes of despair caused by a fierce clash between members of the Juarez Cartel. The fighting left at least eight people dead and four police officers injured.
